doUserTask
{
	float one = 0.0;
	float two = 0.0;
	float half = 0.0;
	float one_half = 0.0;
	float three = 0.0;
	float four = 0.0;
	float number6 = 0.0;
	float number7 = 0.0;
	float number8 = 0.0;
	float number9 = 0.0;
	float number10 = 0.0;
	float number11 = 0.0;

	while (true)
	{
		one = 300;
		half = one / 2;
		two = one * 2;
		three = one * 3;
		four = one * 4;
		number10 = one / 6;
		number6 = one / 4;
		number9 = half + number8;
		number8 = half / 2;
		number7 = one / 3;
		one_half = half * 3;
		number11 = two + half;
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(three);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number6);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(three);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(3520, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(3520, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(3520, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(3136, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);

		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);

		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);

		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);

		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);

		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);

		sleep(one);

		sleep(number10);

		sleep(number10);

		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(3136, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(2793, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_MI_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RE_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(two);
		sleep(number10);
		speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
		sleep(one);
		speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
		sleep(number10);

		sleep(1);
	}
}
